isContains.blackList: word or character that shouldn't exist in the cell, optional, default has already covered %, #, ", ', @, $
isContains.allowEmpty: Default is False, option allow is True

isNumeric.allowNegative: Default is False, option allow is True
isNumeric.allowEmpty: Default is False, option allow is True

isEmail.allowEmpty: Default is False, option allow is True

isDate.allowEmpty: Default is False, option allow is True

isDuplicate.allowEmpty: Default is False, option allow is True

isPrefix.prefix: the word or character that the cell SHOULD start with
isPrefix.allowEmpty: Default is False, option allow is True

isInOption.options: option that the cell should match
isInOption.allowEmpty: Default is False, option allow is True

isASCII.allowEmpty: Default is False, option allow is True
